channel.title: FreedZone 317 PI Where all of your dreams come true!
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/OU3j8Iy.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SRvP5M6.gif[/img]
[B][SIZE=5]FreedScape Introduction![/SIZE][/B]
Dear Moparscape Community, today I would like to excite you with our newest project release that is called FreedZone! FreedZone is based on TridiaxV3 source and our little team of developers who have worked on it for days to come up with the best results for our upcoming players. We decided to bring this game with the idea to full fill your dreams to come true. [/CENTER]
[I][CENTER]Freedzone is a project of dreams of our players. It is based on players and what they wish to add to the game. We hope this will be the first server that has so much freedom and so much choices for our players to make. This means, we will never ignore you with your suggestions and ideas, because every idea can make a change in our game whether it is a good idea or a bad idea. Because game is still in beta version, we don't have a lot added but thats why we want a quick release so you guys can suggest things to add. Our developers are keen to start coding, coding is their life and so they are waiting for you to speak. Every suggestion you make, will be considered and answered. Since our coders like to code, they can promise you that they will be adding more new commands for players, more minigames, more bosses, totally new quests and more! This project is concentrated on the players, maybe you want to add something you dreamed of in runescape or any rsps that they never added to the game, consider is to be done if your suggestion doesn;t ruin anyone's fun and as long as it doesn't ruin our economy. [/CENTER][/I]
[CENTER][U][B][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE][/B][/U] [FONT=Courier New]- Near Flawless Combat - Flawless Switching - Anti Lag - Perfect Barrows - Real Pest Control - Full Waves Jad - Duel Arena - Every Dupe is Fixed - A lot of new bosses - 625 Items _ NPC's and some custom items ( we will add more of course) - Full Dicing and Gambling - Friendly and Professional Staff - Awesome shop items, awesome donator features + items - Fun PK area - 2 Donator areas, will be more benefits in the future! and still is in development! - Constant Updates! - and more... :)[/FONT][/CENTER]
Because we don't want to reveal a lot of stuff, we will add some of the pic's that I hope you see as intrigue to try it out! [spoiler=]New home and new monsters added in this version, you can fight Nomad just being at home!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/25U3712.png?1[/img]
Look at this amazing dicing! You can dice privately or being in the clan! Only donators can host unfortunately right now, check forum for more detail on our dicing rules! Also this place where I am is a little hint for donators! [img]http://i.imgur.com/ekdLKPq.png?1[/img]
Guild warrior's place! Buy armour and have a big fight with a warrior leader! [img]http://i.imgur.com/NnVjzdp.png?1[/img]
Like we said, perfect gambling is here, more fun for you guys to participate in! Check it out! [img]http://i.imgur.com/8ND0e1i.png?1[/img]
New bosses! By the way, we are adding the hardest boss in the game soon! stay tuned, we making this so you are never bored! [img]http://i.imgur.com/1vxX3LO.png?1[/img]
Wan to kill some penguins? Of course now you can! You also get key drops from them, not always but the rate is extremely high so you can expect after even the first kill!Don't get so penisy, they are strong! [img]http://i.imgur.com/dZ31rbW.png?1[/img][/spoiler]
Here I showed you some of the pictures, there is a lot more, I mean a lot more to do, so please check it out!
[CENTER]Also when your level is high enough do ::event to go to the little event our coders made. Be sure to get stronger, because you will need big guts to do this event!
When you are in the game, type ::commands to see your commands!
That's all, thank for reading, we hope you can visit our forums and start suggesting as to how improve this game! Don't forget to try out!
Register on our website too!
Our website: [url=http://www.freedzone.net]www.freedzone.net[/url] Our forum: [url=http://www.freedzone.net/forums]www.freedzone.net/forums[/url]
[I]Warning:Because we have trouble with auto downloader and we still trying to fix this issue, please download client and cache separately and then combine them together by simply following my commands.
Download client: [url=http://download1490.mediafire.com/3xbdv5qu368g/f9c0fd71mvarl3o/FreedZone.jar]http://download1490.mediafire.com/3xbdv5qu368g/f9c0fd71mvarl3o/FreedZone.jar[/url] and place it anywhere. Download cache: [url=http://download938.mediafire.com/lwgscv5fd68g/zzbp0t387qadqbg/.TrisidiaXCache.rar]http://download938.mediafire.com/lwgscv5fd68g/zzbp0t387qadqbg/.TrisidiaXCache.rar[/url] open zipper and drag folder to the Windows C:// and then open the client and it should work. If you need picture tutorial, please comment below and we are absolulety sorry for this trouble, we hope to receive suggestions with this quick release, have a good day and join us now! server is 24.7 ![/I]
Updates: Flower Gambling is now available! Tomorrow all skills re written and new skillzone added!

item.title: FreedZone 317 PI Where all of your dreams come true!
item.dc:creator: @virus95x virus95x
item.description:
@virus95x wrote:

[CENTER]

SRvP5M6.gif750×200

[SIZE=5]FreedScape Introduction![/SIZE]

Dear Moparscape Community, today I would like to excite you with our newest project release that is called FreedZone! FreedZone is based on TridiaxV3 source and our little team of developers who have worked on it for days to come up with the best results for our upcoming players. We decided to bring this game with the idea to full fill your dreams to come true. [/CENTER]

[CENTER]Freedzone is a project of dreams of our players. It is based on players and what they wish to add to the game. We hope this will be the first server that has so much freedom and so much choices for our players to make. This means, we will never ignore you with your suggestions and ideas, because every idea can make a change in our game whether it is a good idea or a bad idea. Because game is still in beta version, we don’t have a lot added but thats why we want a quick release so you guys can suggest things to add. Our developers are keen to start coding, coding is their life and so they are waiting for you to speak. Every suggestion you make, will be considered and answered. Since our coders like to code, they can promise you that they will be adding more new commands for players, more minigames, more bosses, totally new quests and more! This project is concentrated on the players, maybe you want to add something you dreamed of in runescape or any rsps that they never added to the game, consider is to be done if your suggestion doesn;t ruin anyone’s fun and as long as it doesn’t ruin our economy. [/CENTER]

[CENTER][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE]
[FONT=Courier New]- Near Flawless Combat

  • Flawless Switching
  • Anti Lag
  • Perfect Barrows
  • Real Pest Control
  • Full Waves Jad
  • Duel Arena
  • Every Dupe is Fixed
  • A lot of new bosses
  • 625 Items _ NPC’s and some custom items ( we will add more of course)
  • Full Dicing and Gambling
  • Friendly and Professional Staff
  • Awesome shop items, awesome donator features + items
  • Fun PK area
  • 2 Donator areas, will be more benefits in the future! and still is in development!
  • Constant Updates!
  • and more… :)[/FONT][/CENTER]

Because we don’t want to reveal a lot of stuff, we will add some of the pic’s that I hope you see as intrigue to try it out!
[spoiler=]New home and new monsters added in this version, you can fight Nomad just being at home!

25U3712.png?1761×467

Look at this amazing dicing! You can dice privately or being in the clan! Only donators can host unfortunately right now, check forum for more detail on our dicing rules! Also this place where I am is a little hint for donators!

ekdLKPq.png?1763×473

Guild warrior’s place! Buy armour and have a big fight with a warrior leader!

NnVjzdp.png?1759×397

Like we said, perfect gambling is here, more fun for you guys to participate in! Check it out!

8ND0e1i.png?1751×454

New bosses! By the way, we are adding the hardest boss in the game soon! stay tuned, we making this so you are never bored!

1vxX3LO.png?1763×470

Wan to kill some penguins? Of course now you can! You also get key drops from them, not always but the rate is extremely high so you can expect after even the first kill!Don’t get so penisy, they are strong!

dZ31rbW.png?1758×463
[/spoiler]

Here I showed you some of the pictures, there is a lot more, I mean a lot more to do, so please check it out!

[CENTER]Also when your level is high enough do ::event to go to the little event our coders made. Be sure to get stronger, because you will need big guts to do this event!

When you are in the game, type ::commands to see your commands!

That’s all, thank for reading, we hope you can visit our forums and start suggesting as to how improve this game! Don’t forget to try out!

Register on our website too!

Our website: www.freedzone.net
Our forum: www.freedzone.net/forums

[I]Warning:Because we have trouble with auto downloader and we still trying to fix this issue, please download client and cache separately and then combine them together by simply following my commands.

Download client: http://download1490.mediafire.com/3xbdv5qu368g/f9c0fd71mvarl3o/FreedZone.jar and place it anywhere.
Download cache: http://download938.mediafire.com/lwgscv5fd68g/zzbp0t387qadqbg/.TrisidiaXCache.rar open zipper and drag folder to the Windows C:// and then open the client and it should work. If you need picture tutorial, please comment below and we are absolulety sorry for this trouble, we hope to receive suggestions with this quick release, have a good day and join us now! server is 24.7 ![/I]

Updates: Flower Gambling is now available!
Tomorrow all skills re written and new skillzone added!
